      • checkStudentPwd

        public java.lang.Boolean checkStudentPwd(java.lang.String Student_id,
                                         java.lang.String password)
        Check If Student Pwd is Correct
        参数:
        Student_id - An input id which indicate as a student
        password - the input password of student
        返回:
        Whether the authentication was successful

      • getStudentCourseGrade

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> getStudentCourseGrade(java.lang.String student_id)
        Gain all grade for all courses taken by the student

        caller need to make sure student ID is legal

        参数:
        student_id - student ID
        返回:
        a table which raw is each student and col is StuNo, StuName, Grade in a Course; if return empty means that there is something error in this function

      • insertStudentIntoExCourse

        public java.lang.Boolean insertStudentIntoExCourse(java.lang.String student_id,
                                                   java.lang.String ExCourse_id)
        Add a student into a ExCourse
        will insert a empty relationship into database, which means that grade will be 0
        参数:
        student_id - Student ID
        ExCourse_id - ExCourse ID that Student will be inserted into
        返回:
        success => true, failure => 0 TODO if could convert it into a kind of exception?

      • updateStudentExCourseGrade

        public java.lang.Boolean updateStudentExCourseGrade(java.lang.String student_id,
                                                    java.lang.String ExCourse_id,
                                                    double grade)
        update a student grade in a ExCourse
        anno: caller need to make sure the student is in the course before run this function
        参数:
        student_id - studentNo
        ExCourse_id - The ExClassNo that student in
        grade - double grade
        返回:
        true then Succeed; false then failure

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        a function just for test, it shouldn't been run directly or call by up-level application 仅供测试使用，正式运行不会用main函数
        参数:
        args - None
